name: VRWiz
description:
In this virtual reality game you are a wizard of incredible power tasked with defending a small village from hordes of monsters.

Current Features Include
  • Full Index Controller support with finger tracking
  • Also supports htc vive controllers
  • Four different spells that are cast using finger tracking (Also works with vive controllers)
  • The ability of flight
  • Four different monsters
  • One village
  • Several villagers
  • And a bit of scenery
